org.trianacode.annotation

Annotation Type SliderParameter


  • @Target(value=FIELD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface SliderParameter
    GENERAL NOTE: parameters that are displayed in auto generated GUIs should only be primitive or string types.

    automatically defines a field as a parameter and defines the gui for it The gui will be a slider with optional minimum, maximum and current settings. Default max is 100 Default min and current are 0 NOTE: the field should still be a string - for the time being...

    integer set the slider to have an integer, rather than double, scale

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int current 
      boolean integer 
      int max 
      int min 
      java.lang.String title
